We are using **Azure Virtual Desktop** and, due to our security policy, we run **Windows App** under a proxy environment. Currently, when signing in to Windows App in this environment, Single Sign-On (SSO) does not work for users connected via **Entra Connect**.

Could you please update the specifications so that these users can sign in with SSO when using Windows App under a proxy?

For reference, in the **Remote Desktop Client app**, SSO works correctly after pressing the **Register** button. We would like to see similar functionality in Windows App.
